src:
Gara-gara Pengganti Giampaolo, Petinggi Milan Sempat Berseteru
06 Nov 2019, 23:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Kembali, para petinggi AC Milan dikabarkan sempat berseteru sebelum mengambil sebuah keputusan. Berdasarkan laporan, Ivan Gazidis dan Paolo Maldini sempat berdebat soal pengganti Marco Giampaolo.
Seperti yang diketahui, manajemen Rossoneri memutuskan untuk memecat Giampaolo. Mantan pelatih Sampdoria tersebut dianggap bertanggung jawab atas serangkaian hasil buruk yang membuat Milan terpuruk di klasemen Serie A.
Padahal, Giampaolo memegang status pelatih Rossoneri belum begitu lama. Ia ditunjuk sebagai pengganti Gennaro Gattuso yang memutuskan untuk mundur pada akhir musim lalu.
Pemecatan Giampaolo sendiri membuat Milan menciptakan rekor baru. Pria berumur 52 tahun itu menjadi pelatih dengan masa abdi tercepat di San Siro. Ia juga hanya melakoni tujuh pertandingan dengan catatan tiga kemenangan serta empat kekalahan.

Scroll ke bawah untuk membaca informasi selengkapnya.
text:
Because of the replacement Giampaolo, Milan officials had a feud
Nov 6 2019, 23:27 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Back, AC Milan officials reportedly had a feud before taking a decision. Based on reports, Ivan Gazidis and Paolo Maldini had an argument about Marco Giampaolo's successor.
As you know, the Rossoneri management decided to fire Giampaolo. The former Sampdoria coach is considered responsible for a series of bad results that made Milan slump in the Serie A standings.
In fact, Giampaolo holds the Rossoneri coach status not so long ago. He was appointed as Gennaro Gattuso's successor who decided to resign at the end of last season.
Giampaolo's own dismissal made Milan set a new record. The 52-year-old man became the fastest coach at the San Siro. He also only played seven games with a record of three wins and four defeats.

Scroll down to read full information.
